item.title: All the adults colouring is leading to huge sales for pencil companies
item.description:
All the adults colouring is leading to huge sales for pencil companies

SYDNEY, Australia - So many adults are spending their days colouring in the lines, pencil companies are struggling to cope with the demand for coloured pencils and felt tip pens. Staedtler , the German company which produces felt tip pens and coloured pencils, has seen significant growth in Australia as adults get obsessed with the mindful trend.

item.title: 33 Women Doing Amazing Things in Graphic Design
item.description:
33 Women Doing Amazing Things in Graphic Design

These talented women have unleashed their creativity and skills on the world of graphic design. Paula Scher is an American graphic designer, illustrator, and educator, and the first female Principal at . She started experimenting with typography in the early 1980s and looked to historic design sources such as Russian Constructivism, obscure and little-used typefaces, and her seemingly unlimited imagination.
